attributes.action: concession price of entry to football in england to start at 60 and not 65
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this petition is to get football clubs in the English Leagues to lower their concession age to 60 for the price of tickets.

I know some clubs concession is already 60 but l feel that the other clubs would have everything to gain and it would be a gesture of goodwill to their loyal, but getting older fans.
